name: "Kissing Rain" by Roch Voisine Quiz | Music | 15 Questions

questions.text: "Laughs turned to kisses in the back of the cab."
questions.correct: St. Annie of the Wild Blue Eyes
questions.explanation:
St. Annie of the Wild Blue Eyes

	"And it felt good, St. Annie you blessed my bed, your sweet love was my daily bread. You'd come to me when the moon would rise, sweet St. Annie of the wild blue eyes." This song was co-written by Roch Voisine, who also does the accoustic guitar in this song.

questions.text: "But I was just a shadow by your side."
options: Don't Lose Your Faith in Me Now
questions.explanation:
Love Never Dies.

	"Now I live my life just hoping for a chance to have you back to love once more." Roch does the accoustic guitars in this song, and co-wrote it.

questions.text: "When all my bridges burn you tell me that it's all right."
questions.explanation:
Chaque Jour de ta Vie.

	"One world, one ride, one till the end of time; I'll be someone standing by your side every day of your life." Part of this song is in French, as is the title (the literal translation of the title is "Each Day of Your Life). Songwriter Richard Marx, who has also written songs for popera star Josh Groban, does the backup vocals in this song.

questions.text: "Lying here beside you, I'm down on my knees."
questions.explanation:
Deliver Me.

	"Deliver me, deliver me, I'm losing ground; you're the only one, can't you see; deliver me, 'cause I hear the sound of your voice and I feel whole again, babe, please deliver me." Roch co-wrote this song with Amy Sky, who also does the backup vocals.

Stay With Me.

	"The silence spoke and told me so, stuck in the middle of a restless heart, no place else to go." In this song, the backup vocals are done by Peter John Vettesse, Isabelle Nesmon, and Jon Lind.

questions.text: "Here in my heart, you'll always have a home."
options: St. Annie of the Wild Blue Eyes
Don't Lose Your Faith in Me Now
questions.explanation:
Cross My Heart and Soul.

	"You'll always have a home, whether we're together or apart, you're never alone."

questions.text: "They say your heart will know if you let it all flow."
questions.explanation:
The Right One.

	"I suppose, I suppose. They say look in her eyes, 'cause it's hidden inside, I suppose; so I try and try to find a piece of heaven, searching for the keeper of the flame, and I'm waking up in places that are never the same. So we live and learn as we crash and burn, waiting for the right one to come along."

questions.text: "Will you keep this heart from breaking, will you one more time?"
options: St. Annie of the Wild Blue Eyes
questions.explanation:
All I Know.

	"'Cause all I know, all I know is everything you are; it's in my heart, it's in my soul, it's tearing me apart; without you half a life is all I know."

questions.text: "Without your love I'd wind up down upon my knees."
options: Don't Lose Your Faith in Me Now
questions.explanation:
With These Eyes.

	"With these eyes I've learned from my mistakes; that a sad song doesn't care whose heart it breaks."

Whose Heart Is It.

	"So I walked out the door and caught me a bus; then I saw her today, but I had to look away, she thought I was crazy to still feel this way; but I say whose heart is it anyway, if I want to feel this way I'm gonna cry the tears I cr, 'cause it's not as easy for me to say goodbye. Whose heart is it anyway?"

Shed a Light.

	"'Cause a love like hers is hard to find; promise her you'll never leave; let her know you're not that blind, and you will mend the pieces whenever she's brokenhearted."

questions.text: "I'll give it all that I've got."
options: St. Annie of the Wild Blue Eyes
questions.explanation:
Whatever It Takes.

	"Whatever you want, whatever, let me know; whatever you need, whatever, just say so, if there's something missing in your life, you can call me up and I'll try to make it right."

questions.text: "I've only begun to see how I've made my mistakes."
questions.correct: Don't Lose Your Faith in Me Now
questions.explanation:
Don't Lose Your Faith in Me Now.

	"Darling, I say. . . don't lose your faith in me now."

questions.text: "You left me on the frozen April dawn."
questions.explanation:
Kissing Rain.

	"You were the storm in my sky, if only once more I could feel so free, feel you watching over me. There's a breeze on the water blowing time back to me and I can still see your face kissing rain."

Dance With a Stranger.

	"No matter what my head keeps on telling my heart, I'm regretting letting go; I had my reasons to close all those doors, I thought that in time I'd survive. To dance with a stranger is all that is left for me now to stay alive." Thanks for playing my quiz--now go listen to Roch Voisine some more!
